review.title: “Less pay for hell lot of work”
review.pros: Pros – Indepth understanding of steel industry and jargon; Working under a very good, ambitious and cunning partner - one can learn the art of managing people;
review.cons: Cons – Extracting loads of work for peanuts; 2 year bond (are we still in stone age or is slavery legal or what); 6 day week; not professionally run;
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Pay atleast some bulky peanuts if not decent salaries in case you ever felt like hearing one or two good words about yourself.
